data.text: @CityNewsVAN Just the ones who didn’t pay attention in medical school and were in the wrong profession for the wrong reasons. Probably selling MLM elixirs and homeopathic supplements on the side.
@Kev_MacD @CityNewsVAN How does one’s personal vac status affect you? It has absolutely no bearing on you and your health. Please explain this logic to me.

@CityNewsVAN For the love of God, stop fighting over Vax and no Vax. This kind of division is exactly what they wanted. The so-called science does not support the mandates anymore. Can we just not move on and let people choose what they want in their bodies???
Time to move on!
@add_kneught @CityNewsVAN It’s an employment decision too. Clown.

@CityNewsVAN My goodness they have helped us through the waves of the pandemic and they kicked them out just like that. This is what's  bad mandating the vaccine it divides us by discrimination and unnecessary fears.
@yanogrk @CityNewsVAN The vaccine doesn’t create variants. Good lord, you anti science folks need help. Wow. 🤮🤮
@Kev_MacD @CityNewsVAN Go get your fifty booster shot moron
@Kev_MacD @CityNewsVAN Yeah, let’s wash out all of the critical thinkers. Don’t forget to rinse!
@Kev_MacD @CityNewsVAN It’s a health decision. And it’s none of your fucking business if they are vaccinated. Stop being an judgey asshole
